text: Læa cng raluk meux xi sa xi bnˌ maryam di klaw wa xo wngswan khxng xis rx xil xey thæcring chan pen rx sul khx ngxallxhˌ mayang phwk than pen phu yunyan sing thi mi xyu nı tea rxhˌ kxn hna chan læa pen phu cæng khawdi thung rx su l khn hnung phu ca ma phayhlang chan chux khxng khea khux xahma d khran meux khea (xahma d) di mayang phwk khea phrxm dwy hlakthan xan chad cæng læw phwk khea klaw wa ni khux mayakl thæ «
